input.sentences: the bowl of lemonade punch had not been spiked yet | but it was only a matter of time .
the cotton company doors were locked . the town was celebrating its anniversary .
the message was clear . do n't work too hard ! nobody was at this store either . they were baking and cooking for the big party .
the barbershop was open . everyone wanted to look their best for the festivities .
there would be music played on the piano as soon as the townspeople arrived .
output.sentences: The dog was ready to go.
He had a great time on the hike
And was very happy to be in the field
His mom was so proud of him
It was a beautiful day for him.
